title: Aoshi Jiuchong Tian
synopsis:
Chu Yang, wielding the Nine Tribulations Sword, the most powerful divine artifact on the Nine Heavens Continent, was slaughtered. After being driven to the brink of death by a mob, a sword pierced his heart, inadvertently awakening the Nine Tribulations Sword and reborn as a boy, experiencing life anew. In this life, he will forge a different path from his past, protecting his lover and brothers. Chu Yang once again embarks on a journey to find the Nine Tribulations Sword. Fate is about to be rewritten; a passionate young man battles for power and cunning in the martial world, seeking revenge and overturning the Nine Heavens.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
